description.value:
When you fight dirty you fight really dirty. The explosive results speak for themselves.

Prerequisites: Sleight of Hand 5 ranks, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.0Pq35gvSI2JlD682]{Improved Combat Maneuver (dirty trick)}

Benefit: When you succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#dirty-trick]{dirty trick combat maneuver}, you can plant a held grenade on your opponent instead of the standard effects. The grenade explodes at the end of your turn. The target takes a –2 penalty to the saving throw against this grenade, and the grenade’s explosion has half its normal radius.

system.requirements: Sleight of Hand 5 ranks, Improved Combat Maneuver (dirty trick)
